comments: This teacher is very weird. I mean I got a good grade in the class but you NEED to be there for every class once you miss more then 2 days she takes points off your grade. Her grading is really weird!! Tests are easy and only had 5 homework assignments that were easy. DO NOT TALK IN HER CLASS!!! she will move you or kick you out. I guess she\'s okay

First off, she is extremely weird. Her class is easy and you don\'t need the books even though she assigns readings. You do 3 papers, a debate, and a midterm and final. Most of those are easy. She never sticks to deadlines either so if you turn in papers a week late you won\'t get points off. Her class is pretty tough to sit through twice a week because it\'s so boring. But overall it\'s an easy class.

Don\'t even bother to buy the book.The syllabus makes the class seem intimidating but it\'s not. Just ask for extra time on assignments and she wont say no.The class is really boring but she takes attendance so you have to sit through her boring unnecessary lectures. The work you do as in easy papers can be researched online. Take her for an easy A
As long as you know where Yemen is then you\'re good
Class was a basic 101 class, very tough to fail. She fell behind on grading and we had extra weeks to complete some pretty easy assignments.
I enjoyed the class. She\'s a good teacher, very well organized and fair.

She\'s very nice but you have to stay on top of you work from the beginning. She gives no curves and have alot of pop quizzes. That\'s why you must stay on top the readings. If you start to slip, she doesn\'t care. She\'s a fair grader.
The class is not so boring. Loved the films. Good study guides for the exams.
She\'s sooo boring and her laugh is weird. make sure you pay attention take notes and do the web readings. other then that shes nice

Her class was like being in high school again. Tons of pop quizzes and a lot of web and book readings. Her grading sucks. She gives u 100 pts at the start of the year and uses it as a decline balance. Example a 4 pt guiz: u get a 2 out of 4 ur grade is a 98. Or on a test u get a 16 out of 20 ur grade is a 94
Very nice teacher...everything on the study guide is on the test. very basic, just attend class and it is an easy A.
Very interesting class and great class discussions! Excellent teacher who works with the students.
Professor Hawkins is very helpful and she will cut a student a break.
Great teacher! Interesting topics and lots of class discussion. Tests are fairly easy, if you study. Takes roll everyday.

Very knowledgeable about her subject and actually lived in Yemen for several years. Enlightened and interested me in current issues.Very nice crazy laugh.Likes discussions and participation.Read the books.The quizzes are on the reading and notes.Highly recommend if you want to learn a lot.
